# XmlNodeExtensions.FindNode method

Finds specified node in *nodeName* into current node. If not found returns null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

```csharp
public static XmlNode FindNode(this XmlNode node, string nodeName)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| node | Root node. |
| nodeName | Target node. |

## Return Value

A XmlNode founded.
